mapper.select: SELECT EDU_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') FROM DUAL

SELECT E.EDU_ID educationId , EDU_CTGR educationCategory , EDU_TTL educationTitle , MBR_ID memberId , MAX_MBR maxMember , EDU_LOC educationLocation , EDU_CLCM educationCurriculum , EDU_INTR educationIntroduce , SRT_DATE startDate , END_DATE endDate , START_TM startTime , END_TM endTime , EDU_TP educationType , COST cost , FILE_NM fileName FROM EDU_INFO E , FILES F WHERE E.EDU_ID = #{educationId} AND F.ATC_ID = E.EDU_ID
SELECT CD_ID cdId , CD_NM cdNm FROM EDU_CST
SELECT CD_ID cdId , CD_NM cdNm FROM EDU_TIME
SELECT CD_ID cdId , CD_NM cdNm , M_CD_ID FROM SML_CTGR
SELECT MBR_ID memberId FROM EDU_CLASS WHERE EDU_ID = #{educationId} AND STAT = 'EDU_JN_C'
SELECT ID id , EMAIL email FROM MBR WHERE ID = #{memberId}
SELECT DISTINCT M.ID id , M.NM name FROM EDU_HTR EH , MBR M WHERE EH.MBR_ID = M.ID AND EH.STAT = 'EDU_JN_C'
SELECT T.TEAM_ID teamId , T.TEAM_NM teamName , T.TEAM_DT teamDate , T.EDU_ID educationId FROM TEAM T , EDU_INFO EI WHERE T.EDU_ID = EI.EDU_ID

SELECT EDU_ID educationId , EDU_CTGR educationCategory , EDU_TTL educationTitle , MBR_ID memberId , MAX_MBR maxMember , EDU_LOC educationLocation , EDU_CLCM educationCurriculum , EDU_INTR educationIntroduce , SRT_DATE startDate , END_DATE endDate , START_TM startTime , END_TM endTime , EDU_TP educationType , COST cost FROM EDU_INFO
SELECT M.NM name , T.MBR_ID memberId FROM MBR M , TCHR_INFO T WHERE M.ID = T.MBR_ID
